thread.title: Cheryl Shipman
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Cheryl Shipman

author: Cheryl Shipman
title: Cheryl Shipman
text: If you're going to show me a soft mattress cover that comes with my $4,000 bed, give me one. I received a plastic, crinkly one that has to be used else my warranty is voided (also was $100). When I talked to the manager, she was not helpful. Basically said there was nothing they could do, so I returned it. I won't come here again (Brighton location) or any other Gardner White. They just want the sale, they don't care what happens after it's made.
